Scene:
The Tsurugaoka Hachiman Shrine
(Tsurugaoka / 鶴が岡)

Play: The Vendetta in Iga (伊賀越道中双六)

Production: April 1972

– Click image to view.

Toyotake Matsukadayū (豊竹松香大夫)



Shamisen Players:
